Html:
Is there any way to create a nested table (cells within a cell, colspan sort of thing)? I can't find any info on it.

Thanks!
I too would like to know if this can be done.
Actually, nested tables or advanced table styles (colspans or rowspans) aren't supported. I'm sorry.
I would love to see nested tables as well.  Perhaps in the next release? :)

I just got solution for this issue.

please see https://phpword.codeplex.com/discussions/245828
